column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If I reviewed this just on the pizza
column3: this Chicago-style pizza casserole just isn't my thing -- not a fan of giant chunks of watery tomatoes on top of my pizza. And I like mouth-blistering melty pizza
column4: and this was almost room temperature. But
column6: I think a visit to Lou Malnati's is worth the wait and the money. It's a Chicago experience.
